name: ESCAPE (itch) (Dwayne Dev)
description:
You're trying to escape a strange dungeon but a mysterious voice keeps stopping you! Should you listen to them?

There's a friendly Telephone booth to help you figure that out. Give'em a call!

Controls: arriw keys or WASD to move.

Z key and X key to interact with dialogue and in game objects.

This game was made for mini-jam #45, the jam's theme was 'Dungeon' with a restriction being that the project had to do with something 'pocket sized' so I decided to make the game in Gb studio which in theory is made for a pocket sized game platform.
